A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a terrible film. most of the plot points that were set up in The Force Awakens were completely dropped from this movie. The film can't decide on what to do with the characters. Writing is absolutely terrible. I was really excited for this movie. I wanted it to be good. I bought the tickets in advance but it was an utter disappointment. there are a few genuinely funny scenes in this movie\, but they in no way justify it's existence. I was on the fence about going to the theater to see the third movie\, but after seeing this one I'm definitely not going to see any more Star Wars movies in the theaters.
